name: Turbo Drive Panic
description:
Made with UE4. First place winner Mini Game Jam entry for Atlantic University College's 11th Videogame Festival.

Credits:

  • Programmers
    • Flavio E. Hernández (Lead Programmer)
    • Roberto A. Rosario (UI and gameplay)
    • Steven Bido Hiraldo (level design and gameplay)
  • Artists
    • Arturo Lopez (modeling and texturing)
    • Obed Ortiz Miranda (modeling and texturing)
    • Bariben A. Adorno Andino (modeling and texturing)
  • Music
    • Karl Casey - White Bat Audio
